traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The owl doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
traits.desc: The owl has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

actions.name: Talons
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.
